website_summaries.verdict: A certain kind of nostalgic feeling brings back wearers of the Puma Roma to the 1970s. Now more regarded as a lifestyle sneaker than a performance running shoe, the Puma Roma remains comfortable with moderate arch support. It is also perfect for long walks.
pros: A lot of users appreciate the stylish and timeless look of the Puma Roma
It offers good arch support which has impressed many users
Some buyers love the T-toe rubber shape of the outsole as it protects the toes from sudden bumps
It is among the Puma sneakers that are perfect for long walks because it is lightweight, according to the majority of wearers
Some wearers appreciate the nostalgic feeling of wearing the design that brings them back to the 1970s and 1980s
Customers have shared that the synthetic leather upper material stays spotless for quite some time
Shoe owners appreciate the heel support that the Puma Roma provides
From the Puma Roma collection, this classic sneaker is available at a budget-friendly price that is appreciated by many
cons: Several users say that it takes a few days for the shoe to break-in
The upper and sole of the Puma Roma easily fall off, according to some
Some critics have noted it lacks foot ventilation, making the foot sweaty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable AF!
customer_reviews.text: I can understand why some reviewers say that they are smaller than expected. My first impression was that they were really narrow and I’ve never worn shows so narrow before so I was quite worried but I absolutely love them now. They are so comfortable and look great! I use them at the gym and also when I’m running errands. I’m a size 7 and it fit perfectly. I recommend it a lot! I also bought it for £24 it was on sale so bargain!

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes. Not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great, they feel very comfortable. After a few months of use the front of shoe starts to come off and feels like the glue wasnt applied to good to keep it going. I dont wear these shoes every day and I feel that if I would they wouldnt last too long.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Roma Basic Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description:
PUMA Roma - A certain nostalgic feeling takes the PUMA Roma wearers back to the 1970s. Today, the PUMA Roma is more of a lifestyle sneaker than a performance running shoe. It offers moderate foot support and a lightweight material that makes long walks bearable.

Add to your everyday look with a pair of sneakers from the Cali collection and bring the spirit of the tennis court to the street. 

 All features at a glance:

 - EVA midsole for ideal cushioning.
- Reinforcement in the toe and heel area.
- Rubber outsole with special profile.
- No abrasive outer sole.

The perfect women's leisure shoes: both as lightweight sports shoes or normal street shoes. These trainers do everything with you and are still particularly comfortable.
Functional like a street shoe, comfortable like a casual shoe, thanks to the full-length leather upper in fresh spring colours, these trainers can be easily combined
Puma sneakers stand out: thanks to high-quality and cool design, Puma trainer shoes are always particularly stylish and comfortable on the go.
Whether it's a cool low shoe, casual sports shoes or sporty street shoe: leisure trainers from Puma always ensure well-bedded feet in combination with unique style.
